const t=async t=>new Promise(e=>{const a=document.createElement("canvas");a.width=t.naturalWidth,a.height=t.naturalHeight,a.getContext("2d").drawImage(t,0,0),a.toBlob(t=>{e(t)})});export{t as imageToBlob};
